hero.description: At Trans-Gate, we are committed to both precision and guidance. Our translation services provide accurate, professional translations for theses, dissertations, and scientific research, ensuring your ideas are communicated clearly and effectively. Our academic consultations offer expert support to enhance research quality, structure, and overall academic influence, helping you achieve your full potential. We uphold the highest standards of professionalism and quality, serving clients in over 35 countries, including Egypt, Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Kuwait, Qatar, Oman, and more. With a global reach, we empower scholars and researchers worldwide to convey their ideas with clarity, accuracy, and impact.

accuracy.title: Precision & Accuracy
accuracy.description: We deliver highly accurate results powered by advanced technology, ensuring consistent performance and dependable outcomes you can trust.

card1.title: Smart Measurement
card1.text: Our tools provide precise measurements using advanced sensors and modern techniques.

card2.title: Reliable Results
card2.text: We ensure stable and accurate outputs across different conditions and environments.

card3.title: High Efficiency
card3.text: Our process is optimized to reduce errors and increase reliability in every step.

previousWork.title: We Have a Proven Track Record
previousWork.subtitle: Contact us now and join our partners in success

items.title: Translation of Banking Documents – Bank of Oman Arab (2023)
items.desc: In 2023, Trans-Gate handled the translation of a series of critical documents for Bank of Oman Arab, including financial reports, legal documents, and banking contracts. Our team focused on maintaining absolute accuracy in financial and banking terminology, helping the bank enhance communication with its clients and international partners. All projects were delivered on time and met the required standards, ensuring the highest levels of quality and thorough review.

items.title: Regulatory Translation for Import and Sale of Alcoholic Beverages – Iraqi General Customs Authority (2022)
items.desc: In 2022, Trans-Gate translated regulations related to the import and sale of alcoholic beverages, covering legal provisions and regulatory texts. We emphasized precision in conveying legal details to ensure accurate understanding in various official and commercial contexts, fully complying with international standards for legal translation.

items.title: Translation of Commercial Contracts and International Agreements – ICC (2020)
items.desc: In 2020, Trans-Gate translated commercial contracts and import-export agreements for the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC), an international organization representing companies and institutions from over 170 countries. The translation focused on legal accuracy and precise commercial terminology, facilitating smooth execution of agreements and promoting international trade, while adhering to the highest standards of quality and review.

items.title: Translation of Patents for the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) – 2025
items.desc: In 2025, Trans-Gate translated patents for the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO), the international agency specializing in intellectual property and patents. We focused on technical accuracy and scientific terminology to ensure the protection of inventors’ and companies’ rights, meeting deadlines while delivering high-quality translations subject to meticulous review for consistency and legal precision.

items.title: Academic Consulting for PhD Researchers – King Abdulaziz University, Saudi Arabia – 2024
items.desc: In 2024, Trans-Gate provided comprehensive consulting to several PhD students at King Abdulaziz University, Saudi Arabia. Our services included support in research design, data analysis, and professional drafting of research chapters. We emphasized enhancing academic writing quality and ensuring clarity and coherence of ideas, helping researchers elevate their work to meet publication and academic review standards.

items.title: Academic Consulting for Researchers – King Saud University, Saudi Arabia – 2024
items.desc: In the same year, we provided advanced academic consulting for researchers at King Saud University, Saudi Arabia, including support in study preparation, scientific review, and guidance to improve research quality. Our team focused on practical solutions to enhance result analysis, organize references, and draft conclusions with academic precision, enabling researchers to submit rigorous studies aligned with national and international university standards.

items.title: Academic Consulting for a Master’s Researcher, College of Arts – Capital Normal University, China – 2024
items.desc: In 2024, Trans-Gate provided specialized academic consulting for a master’s researcher at the College of Arts, Capital Normal University, China. Our services focused on guiding the researcher in developing the theoretical framework, selecting the appropriate research methodology, and organizing ideas clearly. We also provided detailed review of abstracts and academic chapters to ensure compliance with international standards, helping the researcher deliver a complete and distinguished project on schedule.

about.question: What makes Trans-Gate the preferred choice for translation services and academic consulting?
about.answer: Trans-Gate stands out by elevating your words and empowering your intellect through a combination of accuracy, expertise, and expert guidance.
about.translationDesc: We provide accurate, professional translations for academic papers, research, and official documents while preserving meaning, tone, and academic integrity.
about.consultingDesc: Our expert consultations help refine your research, enhance structure, and maximize academic impact. We support critical thinking, effective communication, and the achievement of your full scholarly potential.
about.card1Desc: Precise and professional translation for academic and official documents.
about.card2Desc: Expert academic guidance to elevate research quality and impact.

accuracy.title: Accuracy & Professionalism
accuracy.description: At TransGate, we ensure every translation is delivered with the highest level of accuracy, quality, and professionalism through strict review processes and expert linguists.

card1.title: Flawless Translation
card1.text: We deliver translations free of errors, preventing delays or setbacks in your academic and professional endeavors.

card2.title: Specialized Linguists
card2.text: Your documents are managed by experts with deep linguistic knowledge and contextual understanding.

card3.title: Academic Research Support
card3.text: We provide guidance to enhance the quality and impact of your research. From structuring your thesis or dissertation to refining your arguments and methodology, we help ensure your work meets the highest academic standards. Our support empowers you to present your ideas with clarity, rigor, and confidence.

professionalism.title: How can academic consultations at Trans-Gate improve your research?
professionalism.desc: Our consultations provide personalized support to identify gaps, clarify concepts, and structure your work for maximum clarity and impact. We guide you step by step, ensuring your research is logically organized, academically rigorous, and clearly communicated.

makeAppointment.title: Access Our Services with Ease
makeAppointment.desc: Experience seamless access to TransGate's translation and academic consultation services. Our streamlined process allows you to submit your documents, request consultations, and receive expert support quickly and efficiently, saving you time while ensuring high-quality results.
makeAppointment.desc2: From graduation certificates and legal contracts to theses, dissertations, and medical reports—TransGate is your trusted partner for all translation needs.

testimonials.title: Our Customers' Positive Comments
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by researchers and clients worldwide—here’s what they say about their experience.

items.text: Dr. Hager is one of the best people in the field of translation. Extremely professional and delivers excellent quality. She delivered exactly on time. Thank you so much for your effort! I will definitely work with you again. Your dedication and attention to detail truly satisfy the client.
items.name: Mariam Adel

items.text: I honestly couldn’t believe how accurate the translation was, even after I converted the file to PDF everything stayed perfectly aligned. The work was extremely precise, and you delivered exactly what I needed and more. Thank you so much for the amazing effort.
items.name: Ahmed Mostafa

items.text: I really appreciate your accuracy, commitment to deadlines, and the quality of the translation itself. Everything was delivered better than I expected in terms of timing and professionalism. Honestly, I’ve never dealt with someone as respectful and understanding as you. May God bless you.
items.name: Sara Hany

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.error: Failed to load partners. Please try again later.

q1.q: How do you ensure translation accuracy?
q1.a: Our team combines linguistic expertise with subject-specific knowledge. Each translation undergoes multiple quality checks to maintain meaning, tone, and academic integrity.

q2.q: Can Trans-Gate help with non-academic texts?
q2.a: Yes. While our focus is academic, we also provide professional translations for business, technical, and personal documents upon request.

q3.q: How do I start a translation or consultation project?
q3.a: Submit your document or project details via our website. Our team will review it and provide a personalized plan with timelines and pricing.

q4.q: How long does a typical translation take?
q4.a: Delivery times depend on the document’s length and complexity. We provide an estimated timeline upon review, ensuring quality is never compromised.

q5.q: Can you handle urgent or last-minute requests?
q5.a: Yes. We offer expedited services while maintaining professional standards. Contact us to discuss your specific needs and deadlines.

q6.q: Do you offer revisions or edits after translation?
q6.a: Absolutely. We allow revisions to ensure the translation meets your expectations and accurately conveys your ideas.

about-us.title: About TransGate
about-us.subtitle: We enrich knowledge. We empower minds.
about-us.paragraph1: Trans-Gate is dedicated to bridging knowledge and empowering minds. We provide professional translation services for all Documents, ensuring every word is precise, clear, and impactful. Our approach goes beyond language, focusing on conveying the full meaning, tone, and academic integrity of your work.
about-us.paragraph2: Alongside translation, we offer expert academic consultations. We guide students and researchers in structuring their projects, enhancing clarity, and maximizing academic impact. Our mission is to support your intellectual growth, helping you communicate ideas effectively and achieve your highest potential.
about-us.paragraph3: At Trans-Gate, our core values of accuracy, integrity, professionalism, and client empowerment shape every project. We combine meticulous attention to detail with a commitment to inspiration and clarity, ensuring each client receives guidance and service that elevates their work and strengthens their academic journey.

We aim to empower our clients to reach their full potential through linguistic support and guidance, fostering a supportive environment that builds confidence and promotes continuous academic growth.

ethics.title: Ethical Standards
ethics.subtitle: Our commitment to professional integrity and responsible academic support.

p1.title: Professional Standards
p1.desc: We deliver translation and academic support services in accordance with the highest professional and ethical standards.

p2.title: Academic Integrity
p2.desc: We promote honest learning and ensure our services support skill development without replacing personal effort.

p3.title: No Ghostwriting
p3.desc: We do not complete assignments, write research papers, or prepare theses/dissertations on behalf of students or researchers.

p4.title: Responsible Use
p4.desc: Our services are intended for learning, improvement, and communication only, and must not be used for cheating or unethical purposes.

ethics.p1: At TransGate, our goal is to provide academic support and translation services in line with the highest professional and ethical standards.
ethics.p2: We offer clear, accurate guidance as well as editing, proofreading, and consultation services to help students, researchers, and professionals develop their academic and research skills.
ethics.p3: We do not complete academic tasks, write research papers, or prepare university theses on behalf of clients. We also do not alter content in a way that violates ethical standards or academic integrity policies.
ethics.highlight: Clients are fully responsible for their academic and professional work, and for complying with relevant laws, institutional policies, and academic integrity requirements.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.desc: We prioritize precision in every translation, ensuring your ideas are conveyed clearly and faithfully.

footer.desc: Experience seamless access to Trans-Gate’s translation and academic consultation services. Our streamlined process allows you to submit your documents, request consultations, and receive expert support quickly and efficiently, saving you time while ensuring high-quality results.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer on Academic Integrity and Ethical Policy
disclaimer.body1: Trans-Gate is committed to providing translation and educational support services in line with high professional and ethical standards. Our mission is to deliver accurate, clear, and helpful guidance while promoting honest learning and academic integrity. We offer translation, tutoring, editing, reviewing, and consultation services for students, researchers, and professionals who seek to expand their knowledge, improve academic writing, and develop research skills. We do not complete assignments, write research papers, theses, dissertations, or any academic work on behalf of clients, nor do we create or alter content in ways that mislead or violate ethical standards.
disclaimer.body2: By using our services, you accept full responsibility for your academic or professional work. Our role is to guide and support, not to replace your effort. Any assistance provided, including research support, translation, feedback, or editing, is intended solely for learning, improvement, or communication purposes. Misusing our services is strictly prohibited. Submitting translations, advice, suggestions, or reviewed materials as original work without proper acknowledgment violates both academic integrity and professional ethics, and Trans-Gate does not condone such actions.
disclaimer.body3: Clients are responsible for ensuring that any materials or guidance they receive comply with relevant laws, regulations, and the academic or ethical policies of their institutions. Trans-Gate is not liable for how its services are used, and clients bear full responsibility for the final use of any materials, notes, or consultations provided. We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone attempting to misuse our platform for academic dishonesty, information manipulation, or other unethical purposes.
disclaimer.body4: By continuing to use our services, clients agree to comply with this ethics policy and to support responsible, ethical learning and professional practices.
